about_the_game:
Pff, I played 100 Turn-Based Tactics, they EASY! Right?!


Your City is under siege and your status is:

  • 4 Soldiers against 2 dozen Tanks
  • All units have 5 movement points each turn
  • All units have 1 action points in each turn
  • You must destroy all Tanks and save at least 1 Soldier

You can hear enemy Tanks moving, but you can not see them afar due to no electricity, no light, night time, dust storm. It feels like there is no hope. When you finally able to see enemy Tank near you, make both plan A - attack and plan B - back to save zones. You can hide behind buildings, destroyed Tanks, just know that Tank has same line of sight as your Soldiers. Remember, this is your City, you must take last stand, you must save your citizens.

You sure you can pass level 1 difficulty?


Level 1 Difficulty - IQ 80
Level 1 Difficulty - IQ 100
Level 1 Difficulty - IQ 120

Game tested by professional Chess player - Failed at level 2, and TBS/TBT player at level 1 when tried for the first time. Challenge begins. No cheating, be honest with yourself.

Technical marvel


Battle for Desert City supports both latest DLSS 3.5 and FSR 3.0 with Frame Generation. Game also offers ability to run compact 720p, competitive 1080p, best cost-value 1440p and high-end display setups with 4K resolution with 5 scalable visual settings.

P.S.


Game was fully developed and published by single person from Kazakhstan, hopefully together, with your support, suggestions we will make this game even better, we will get further contents such as new game modes, maps, Multiplayer and more coming up features. Thank your for you support!

name: Battle for Desert City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 30 FPS or 60 FPS DLSS/FSR/FG
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-13400 or AMD Ryzen 7 5800
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX GeForce RTX 3060 or Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4K 30 FPS or 60F FPS DLSS/FSR/FG

short_description: Battle for Desert City - is great chance to start your journey into TBS genre in wargame settings and test your skills. Learn to think like real soldier on the battlefield and like general in war room at the same time. Achieve hard, well deserved victory fighting overwhelming enemy forces.
